game.name: Boat Race Deluxe
game.description:
This race is not going to be conducted between the two cars, bikes or airplanes. A computerized boat will be there to compete against you. Are you ready to fight against the tough competitor? If yes, click the play button and get ready to dive into the biggest boat racing competition. We have got you covered today with a brand new racing challenge where your beat your opponent to the finish line. Set the direction and power of your beat to win in Boat Race Deluxe!

Hey! Your opponent is very sharp and fast so try to be as quick as possible to beat him. Tap the screen or click and hold the LMB to raise the power to move your boat in this HTML5 2D boat racing game! Keep your eyes on the screen and do not forget to release the touch of the mouse button when you notice the value of power is enough to move your boat. You cannot take rest as your opponent will try to put every possible effort to reach to the finish line first.

Make sure that you reach to the endpoint first before your rival enters the area. Click the Retry button in case if you fail at the initial attempts! We cover countless popular free racing titles where you cannot only drive boats, but you will also be given choices to drive other vehicles like cars, motorcycles, airplanes and more without download. It is our pleasure to serve you with the best of gaming by just investing a few efforts online. Have a good day!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Boat Race Deluxe at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: CLICK AND HOLD THE BOAT TOWARDS RIGHT DIRECTION,RELESE TO MOVE AHEAD
